title: Nightmares & Daydreams
description: A collection of intriguing stories and poems of the paranormal.The stories include:A tragic child ghost-- A story about a con worthy of Alfred Hitchcock. An evil wind-up toy guaranteed to give you nightmares or worse! An unbelieveably eerie story about a pact with the devil. And a wickedly satisfying story of revenge against an erring husband. (What wife wouldn't chuckle at that)?! There are also some hauntingly beautiful poems the author has included.
author: Barbara Watkins
